Technicalities (comment later)

```{r}
## Output filename
outputFile <- ".csv"
paramFile <- ".rds"

## Verbose mode
verbose <- TRUE

## Number of decimal places
ndec <- 4
```


Input parameters

```{r}
## Number of replications
replications <- 1

## Length of the simulation
timesteps <- 11000

## Number of factors
k <- 3

## Correlation
correlation <- 0.2

## Models (Fixed so that model 14 is not model 10). 
load(paste0(baseDir, "/FunctionsLoads/Loads/DevezerLoads/models"))

## Identify the number of predictors of each model
predictors <- getPredictors(models)

## Generate Betas
weights <- generateBetas(models)

## modelselection 
modelSelection <- "hard"
```

ID variables to be looped over: 

```{r}

#Populations prep 

#ID variables we vary based on
populations <- list("All") #"Rey", "Tess", "Mave", "Bo", "All"
sigmas <- list(0.2) #0.2, 0.5, 0.8 
sampleSizes <- list(100) #20, 100. 
tModels <- list(2) #2, 7, 13. 
modelCompares <- list(BIC) #AIC, BIC 


```

set seed 

```{r}
seeds <- seedGenerator(replications, paste0(inputDir, "/seeds.csv"))
```

Run the ABM 

```{r}

for (population in populations){
  for (sigma in sigmas){
    for (sampleSize in sampleSizes){
      for (tModel in tModels){
        for (modelCompare in modelCompares){
simulatorRework(replications, timesteps, models, k, tModel,
  nRey, nTess, nBo, nMave, weights, sampleSize, correlation, sigma,
  modelCompare, modelSelection, inputDir, outputDir, outputFile, paramFile,
  verbose, ndec, seeds)
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

```
